price: kanneen lubbuun jiraniifi isaan du’an wal qixaa miti. Allaahn nama fedhe ni dhageessisa. Ati nama awwaala keessa jiru dhageessisaa miti.
arabic: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَحۡيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā yastawī al-aḥyāu walā al-amwātu inna al-laha yus'miʿu man yashāu wamā anta bimus'miʿin man fī al-qubūri
